title: Select
summary: A select enables the user to choose one or multiple options from a list.
preamble: The select component is designed for single-choice selections, offering native mobile functionality and enhanced accessibility. Best suited for simple option lists, while maintaining familiar dropdown behaviour across devices.
anatomy-overview:
The select (and other form controls) are divided in sections that are re-used between components.

*   **Header**: Label, label support, contextual help, extended support.
    
*   **Body**: The field.
    
*   **Footer**: Error message.
anatomy-details: Details of header and footer elements are described in dropdown

overview.title: Behaviour
overview.section-content: Styling for the list of options varies by browser, and long text in the select component is truncated with ellipses.

overview.title: Browsers
overview.section-content: The appearance and behavior of the option list will be handled according to each browser.
